title: Examining the effects of input allocation on potato production, production efficiency, and technical inefficiency in potato farming: Evidence from the Stochastic Frontier Model in search of sustainable farming practices
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 7

Author(s): Rafiqah Maulidiyah, Muslim Salam, Muhammad Hatta Jamil, A. Nixia Tenriawaru, Rahmadanih, Saadah
